name: player1
FINGERBALL: Fingerball is a basketball game that you control by using the Leap Motion controller to manipulate the ball. You can bounce and dribble the ball-- extra points if you make a basket!
BABYONFIRE: Baby on fire is a game that has not been built yet, but it should be tons of fun and you lose points if you let the baby get lit on fire.
BREAKOUT: Breakout your basic Pong game, except you use the Leap Motion controller to track your hand movement. The player loses a turn when the ball touches the bottom of the screen. To prevent this from happening, the player has a movable paddle to bounce the ball upward, keeping it in play. Get extra points for multiple rebounds in a row!
MULTIFEET: 'Swipe' with the Leap Motion controller to move the mulitipedal avatar through the landscape. The more distance you cover, the more points you get. You can also go in reverse-- keep an eye out for extra achievments.
